assetsManager.newScriptExtension.description: File extension for newly created empty scripts (e.g. 'js', 'ts').

assetsManager.enableTemplateReplacement.description: Always request a filename when creating from a template. Note: If the template contains the Replacement Key, the name will be requested regardless of this setting.

assetsManager.templateReplacementKey.description: The key to look for in template files. If found, you will always be prompted for a name to replace this key.

assetsManager.templatesPath.description: Path to templates folder (relative to workspace root)

assetsManager.fileTemplatePath.description: Path to the template file (relative to workspace root).

assetsManager.rootFolders.description: Root folders to display in TreeView

assetsManager.copyKeyIncludeExtension.description: Include file extension when copying asset key (e.g. 'image.png' vs 'image').

assetsManager.panelState.description: Internal: Panel state (widths, expanded nodes, etc.)
